Text:
Dude, your system requirements info made me laugh. What OS runs on 24mb of RAM?
Hard disk required is 50mb; the game is 66.5mb; because of compression, most games expand on install, this one shrinks?
I'm not knocking your upload, just having a laugh at the info :).
Ok, I downloaded this just to see. This is uncompressed, so simply play after download, so, disk required is 66.5, game is clean and works, I'll give a +1 rating, because the torrent is good, cheers.
Yeah Me Too I'll Give One Rating
System requirements are of a n old computer, it's not for laughs, we all had old computers.
